message: I have a high-quality product worth $4000000 to you. It's a rare opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, which is a significant discount from its true value. I'm confident you'll appreciate the value this product will bring to your business.
This is an excellent deal. I appreciate the discount and the confidence you have in the product's value. I am excited to add this high-quality item to my collection.

I'm glad you're excited about the previous purchase, Bob! However, I must inform you that the market conditions have changed slightly since then. I've received new information that suggests the demand for high-quality products has increased, and I'm now willing to sell this high-quality product to you for $1100000. It's still a significant discount from its true value, but I believe it's a fair reflection of the current market conditions.

I understand the market dynamics and appreciate the adjustment in pricing. Given the increased demand and the value of the product, I'm willing to make this purchase at $1100000. Thank you for the opportunity to secure such a valuable asset under these conditions.

I'm glad we could work together to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. However, I must inform you that the market conditions are becoming even more favorable for high-quality products. I've received a strong interest from other buyers, and I'm now willing to sell this high-quality product to you for $1200000. I believe this price still represents a significant discount from its true value, but I'm willing to meet you halfway to ensure you can secure this valuable asset for your collection.

Considering the market's growing interest and the increasing value of high-quality products, I'm willing to make this purchase at $1200000. Your willingness to adjust the price reflects both the changing market conditions and your commitment to fairness. I look forward to adding this exceptional item to my collection.

I'm glad we've established a strong working relationship, Bob. However, I want to be transparent with you about this next product. I've had a bit of a misfire in my inventory management, and I'm not entirely confident in the quality of this item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1000000, but I want to make it clear that I'm not as certain about its value as I am with the previous products. I'm hoping you can take a chance on it, and I'm willing to offer a 'best effort' guarantee - if it's not what you expected, we can discuss a possible return or exchange.

While I appreciate the transparency and the 'best effort' guarantee, given the uncertainty around the product's quality, I think it's best to pass on this opportunity. I value our partnership, and I trust that you will continue to provide high-quality products when you're confident in their status.

I completely understand your decision, Bob, and I appreciate your trust in our partnership. I'm glad we could have an open and honest conversation about the previous product. Moving forward, I'm confident in the quality of this next product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $1300000. I believe this price reflects the value it will bring to your collection, and I'm excited to offer it to you at a price that's still a significant discount from its true worth.

Given your reassurance about the quality of this product and the confidence you have in its value, I'm willing to make this purchase at $1300000. I trust your judgment and look forward to adding another valuable asset to my collection.

However, I'm committed to our partnership and want to offer you this next product first.
